document_data.name: Saura Umakra
document_data.basicrefs: {{cite book/Realms of the Dragons II/The Book Dragon|141-143}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Saura Umakra''' was a [[Red Wizard]], and apprentice of [[Nusair Darkul]]. In [[Hammer]] of {{yearlink|1372}}, she recovered the '' [[the Scalamagdrion|Scalamagdrion]]'' and used it to kill her master, inheriting his red robes.{{cite book/Realms of the Dragons II/The Book Dragon|154}}
document_data.Description: Saura bore a dragon's claw tattoo encircling her left eye, which glowed at the touch of her master, and an intrincate tattoo on her throat.{{cite book/Realms of the Dragons II/The Book Dragon|143-144}}
document_data.Personality: Saura was ambitious and ruthless, apprenticing herself to the repellent and lecherous Nusair Darkul in order to become a Red Wizard. She also was treacherous, eventually setting a trap for her master so as to inherit his robes with the blessing of his enemy.
document_data.Abilities: Saura could employ ''[[light]]''. In contrast to her apparently meager magical ability, she was able to master the ''Scalamagdrion'' within the space of three days.
document_data.Possessions: Saura carried a serrated [[dirk]]. She also had her master's robes, and eventually, ''the Scalamagdrion''.
document_data.Activities: Saura was her master's lover as well as apprentice, though she detested it.
document_data.Relationships: Saura Umakra was Nusair Darkul's apprentice and lover, knowing him best of all people in Thay.
